subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Pienette Pierson scored 20 points, Leilani Mitchell made four 3-pointers and the visiting Liberty held off the Atlanta Dream, 85-75, to solidify its hold on third in the W.N.B.A.’s Eastern Conference.
